t: Amazon.com | Ryn X-Run Athletic Shoe - Unisex (7.5 (M) US Women's / 6.5 (M) Men's US, Black) | Walking
s: Fast forward and the problem continues ... as the Ryn ones. That is the good news. The bad news is that the shoe technology is faulty and the soles become detached from the shoe. My attempts at fixing with industrial rubber cement have only worked for relatively short times and they are hard to do without being ugly. I wish the manufacturer could get this quality control problem solved. Shoes today shouldn't have the soles coming off. I've tried other brands which do not ...

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 3 days ago - Nike confirmed to CNBC that its shoes are returning to Amazon.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
